description: Iri Shishou, literally Instructor Iri or Master Iri, is the instructor of http://anidb.net/ch43360 [Deshi Zero Gou]. In the Einzbern Consultation Room specials of the http://anidb.net/a8160 [first] and http://anidb.net/a8880 [second] parts of Fate/Zero, she explains to her pupil some of the inner workings of the system behind the Holy Grail War, and gives all sorts of advice to those who knock at her door seeking it.
name: Iri Shishou
